data.description: Scan and build datatype for fields in a file
data.communities: Talked with Tim Bunce a while ago
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Sometime it is difficult to get field information from a delimited
    text file. This module intends to scan and build a column definition
    from a plain text file. Then you can write out the field/column
    definiton, or pass it to Data::DisplayDescribed module to display
    part or all the records, or pass it to Oracle::DataLoader to
    generate SQL code, control file, and to be used by Oracle SQL*Loader
    to load the records into Oracle database.
